text: Jamie Bethany Loftus (born August 18, 1993 in Boston, Massachusetts) is an American writer, stand-up alternative comedian, animator, podcast co-host and actress based in Los Angeles. She is known for her solo work, such as her one- woman shows I Lost My Virginity on August 15, 2010 and Boss, Whom is Girl. She has also written comedic articles, and written/starred in video content, for media sites such as Adult Swim, Comedy Central, Paste and Super Deluxe. She was nominated for an Emmy for her work on Robot Chicken in 2020. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1993 births * Category:Living people * Category:Writers from Boston Category:Comedians from Boston Category:American animators Category:American television writers Category:American television actors
title: Jamie Loftus
